body:
This PR:
- [x] Adds output to the `spack external find` command to inform users of the result of the operation
- [x] Fixes a bug introduced in #17804 (a function was not updated to conform to the new format)

Example of the output from this PR:
```console
$ spack external find cmake gcc
==> The following specs have been detected on this system and added to /home/culpo/.spack/packages.yaml
cmake@3.18.1  gcc@4.8  gcc@5.5.0  gcc@6.5.0  gcc@7.5.0  gcc@8.4.0  gcc@9.3.0  gcc@10.1.0

$ spack external find cmake gcc
==> No new external packages detected

```
title: Improve output of the external find command
